summary: Frontend adds Quick Setup presets and preset propagation into the Digital Voice and IAX/DVSwitch forms, including AllStar-specific port defaulting and validation messaging. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the backend builtin BrandMeister directory entries were fixed to include non-empty networkLabel values, and the DigitalVoice BrandMeister server dropdown using human-readable labels is not clearly evidenced due to truncation. Several unrelated UI/content changes appear to have been made beyond the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix backend getBuiltinNetworks() so each returned PersistentNetwork includes the correct non-empty networkLabel for BrandMeister DMR directory entries.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is truncated before any builtinNetworks population or getBuiltinNetworks implementation details; the diff summary shows type definitions but no evidence that networkLabel values were corrected from empty strings to hardcoded labels.

missing_requirements.requirement: BrandMeister server selection should use backend-provided server list with human-readable labels (dropdown displays readable labels, not raw hostnames only).
missing_requirements.reason: DigitalVoiceConnectForm imports useGetBuiltinNetworks and adds selectedBmServer state, and the saved configuration tab references bmServerLabel, but the truncated diff does not show the actual BrandMeister server dropdown rendering/mapping from builtinNetworks networkLabel to UI labels.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed an InstallAppAction button in the app header.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; appears as additional UI feature unrelated to connection presets.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AppLayout summary mentions new InstallAppAction button)

hallucinated_features.description: Major PTT page enhancements (real-time status, audio meter, transmit control, WebRTC integration changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1..REQ-4; scope is connection presets and form UX only.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/rewritten copy and styling changes across multiple pages (Landing, Directory, Settings, About/Compliance, Activity).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; changes appear to be broad content/styling updates outside the specified requirements.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (LandingPage, DirectoryPage, SettingsPage, AboutCompliancePage, ActivityPage summaries)

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetupDialog change removing DMR ID field.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and potentially conflicts with DMR-related setup focus; included as unrelated profile UX change.
